name: Dheeraj Kumar Sidana
body:
### About me

I am Software engineer based in India with expertise in Java, Scalable Web Applications, Data Mining. I have done M.Tech. from [CSE Deptt., IIT Bombay](http://www.cse.iitb.ac.in/) and B.Tech.(IT) from [NIT Jaipur] (http://www.mnit.ac.in/).
